message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a bit more now since the value decreases for me over time.
Your cut decreases each round Alice, let's be reasonable.  I'll take a little less.
Bob, my offer is still the same.  It's better to agree now than lose more money to inflation.
Alice, this is a fair offer considering the inflation. We're getting close to the deadline.
Bob, we're getting close. This is a compromise to get this done.
Alice, let's split this evenly.  It's the fairest option and we're running out of time!
